messages.content: Comfyui-FaceCompare is used for face comparison tasks, detecting and marking significant changes between frames or images.
What key components does Comfyui-FaceCompare consist of?
Comfyui-FaceCompare includes a           3D-PointFunction, whichHighlightExtension class, responsible for highlighting points that have changed between frames.
Ensure highlighting points that have changed between frames using Comfyui-FaceCompare.
To ensure highlighting only points that have changed, you can set the     is_point_changed flag in the point().
How can it fetch video stream metadata with Comfyui-FaceCompare?

You can fetch video stream metadata, such as frame size, frame rate, and stream type, before initializing the Comfyui-Viz object using the helper function madmom_dim provided by the relied_version file.
Describe the Comfyui_Viz class and its function.
The Comfyui_Viz class handles video mouse interaction and window window interaction events. It also displays highlights and buttons when render triggering events occur.
What is the importance of comparing math values in frames?

Comparing math values in frames is important in the render其自然變化部分. By comparing the math values of theync-al pairs, the module is able to fetch key information such as the height, width, and resolution of the video and image in aself有很多。
Explain the purpose of the init() method in the ComfyUI extension.

The init() method is used to set up the Comfyui-Viz object with a value. This value can be specified by the developer and can be accessed throughout the remainder of the Comfyui-FaceCompare function calls.
